chapters.title: Chapter 11: Tar Valon
chapters.info: Faolain Orande, p. 155 (119)—Dark, curly-haired Accepted. She escorts Nynaeve, Egwene, and Elayne to their rooms after they come back from Falme. She is only slightly older than Nynaeve. She has a dislike for wilders. Egwene thinks it very likely that Faolain will choose the Red Ajah.
